Maintenance & Care

Steel legs are neat cuz they are strong, also they look cool. they can be many colours.

Hairpins

Hairpin legs are a classic that look great paired with any top. Available in coffee table, end table, or desk height. Hairpin legs are good for coffee tables but not so great at doing your hair. i need to fill some space.

Another option is to add a third piece of bar, here we have some 3-bar Hairpins finished in copper and mounted on a matching kintsugi table top. The extra support...

We're always looking for new ways to get creative with the classics, these legs have been painted white and then Dipped for some added pizzaz

Structural Steel Legs

Whether you're looking for a sturdy conversation peice or some effective protection during the next tornado, there's no substitute for structural grade steel. This table has Trapazoidal legs made of 2"x3".

Here is an example of the beefiest hairpin leg you'll find anywhere the Squarepin

Structural Bases

You ever hear the expression built like a brick shithouse? Both our Regular and Trapezoidal bases come with a simple and ludacris meteor-proof guarantee: If your table fails becomes bent, dented, collapses or otherwise fails to meet your expectations following a strike from a meteorite, we'll replace it free of charge.

The trapezoidal option is great, as it reduces toe stubbing by nearly 30%
